alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 2:31PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Archuleta and east central La Plata Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 230 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bayfield, or 18 miles east of Durango, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Archuleta and east central La Plata Counties. This includes U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 102 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Grand Junction.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
